name: Jay V. YUNIK, Appellant v. Jeffrey BEARD, Secretary, D.O.C., Coleman-Superintendent, Susan Ballaglini, Cheryl George-Inmate Accounts, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, James Corbett-PA. Attorney General, Appellees

parties: Jay V. YUNIK, Appellant v. Jeffrey BEARD, Secretary, D.O.C., Coleman—Superintendent, Susan Ballaglini, Cheryl George—Inmate Accounts, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, James Corbett—PA. Attorney General, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of December, 2010, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
10 A.3d 266
Jay V. YUNIK, Appellant v. Jeffrey BEARD, Secretary, D.O.C., Coleman—Superintendent, Susan Ballaglini, Cheryl George—Inmate Accounts, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, James Corbett—PA. Attorney General, Appellees.
